title: Login Issue - Cannot Access Dashboard
description: User unable to login to dashboard after password reset. Getting authentication error.

title: Payment Gateway Not Working
description: Payment processing fails at checkout. Users cannot complete purchases.

title: Email Notifications Not Sending
description: Automated email notifications for order confirmations are not being sent to customers.

title: Mobile App Crashes on Startup
description: iOS app crashes immediately after opening. Affects version 2.1.3.

title: Search Function Returns No Results
description: Product search functionality is broken. No results shown for any search query.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: Frequent database timeouts causing slow page loads and errors.

title: User Profile Update Fails
description: Users cannot update their profile information. Form submission returns error.

title: File Upload Size Limit Error
description: File upload fails for files larger than 5MB despite 10MB limit setting.

title: Shopping Cart Items Disappear
description: Items randomly disappear from shopping cart during browsing session.

title: API Rate Limit Exceeded
description: Third-party API calls failing due to rate limit. Affecting data synchronization.

title: SSL Certificate Expiry Warning
description: SSL certificate expires in 7 days. Need immediate renewal to avoid service disruption.

title: Backup System Failure
description: Automated backup system has failed for the past 3 days. Data at risk.
